name: DECEIVED - CGJ19
description:
You need to save your consciousness from the corrupting lies. Fight through hordes of lies to save yourself. Free your self from them.

Fight through the 5th wave and reveal the truth.

WASD / ZQSD / Arrows - to move (you can change controls in Input in the launcher)
LMB - to shoot
RMB - to pick up

This game is made for Community Game Jam 2019 and it's not a final look of the game. We will continue working on it and adding new stuff.

Rate the game and report any bug you find.

Submitted to the Community Game Jam 2019.
